channel.title: Okay i know i sound like a idiot, scripters read here
channel.description:
Okay i know this will make me go major cool points down. lmfao.
Anyway, i need to know where the best scar scripting guide is....since i suck. I search google, freddy1990.com etc. and found nothing.
Sorry for being a retard lol.
EDIT - btw - scartutorial.exe thing on this forum, links outdated they dont work lol.

item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Renax:

i alway’s thought taking a simple, already made script and sightly editing/playing with the procedures/functions was a better way to learn.

It is.

Read full topic

item.title: Okay i know i sound like a idiot, scripters read here
item.dc:creator: @Penguins Penguins
item.description:
@Penguins wrote:

Open up SCAR, and press F1.

That gives you the basics, then it goes into all the functions SCAR has.

Read the first guide, then find a function that interests you, and make a program using it.

Read full topic
